node.name: Documentation
node.rich_text: – Samjhao ki test ka goal kya tha. 2.
– Bina confusion ke, clean aur clear language ho.
Tools Jo Use Kar Sakte Hain:

[Title Page] ↓ [Executive Summary] – non-technical overview ↓ [Scope & Objectives] – kya test kiya gaya, boundaries kya thi ↓ [Testing Methodology] – Black-box/White-box, tools ↓ [Vulnerability Details] – har bug ka detail + impact + proof ↓ [Remediation] – kaise fix karein ↓ [Conclusion] – kya mila, kya karna chahiye ↓ [Appendix] – screenshots, commands, payloads

row.cell: Notes + screenshots + links sab store karne ke liye ek tree-style note-taking app
Screenshot lene ke liye arrows, highlights, blur features ke saath
